title: Emerald Radiance: Three-Layered Floral Diamond Haaram
materials: 64 Marquise +7 cut). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This stunning three-layered haaram features a delicate floral design, with each 'flower' meticulously crafted from emeralds and polki diamonds. The classic layering style adds depth and grandeur. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, giving it a timeless appeal. The emeralds are set in a secure bezel setting, accentuating their vibrant green color.
occasions: Ideal for grand celebrations like weddings (muhurtham)
and high-profile social events. Also suitable for gifting to a loved one during auspicious occasions like Dasara or Diwali.
description: This haaram is a masterpiece of traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of vibrant emeralds and sparkling polki diamonds creates a captivating visual spectacle. Its three-layered design makes it a statement piece that will elevate any outfit. It holds immense cultural value and will become a cherished heirloom for generations to come.
